data.name: RequiredInfoMissing
data.value: Required information is missing. Please provide all necessary data.

data.name: InvalidInput
data.value: Invalid input provided. Please check your request and try again.

data.name: InvalidOperation
data.value: This operation is not valid in the current state.

data.name: Unauthorized
data.value: You are not authorized to perform this action.

data.name: NotFound
data.value: The requested resource was not found.

data.name: Timeout
data.value: The request timed out. Please try again later.

data.name: HighLoad
data.value: The system is currently experiencing high load. Please try again in a few moments.

data.name: SystemError
data.value: A system error occurred. Please try again later.

data.name: Unexpected
data.value: An unexpected error occurred. Our team has been notified.

data.name: ValidationFailed
data.value: Validation failed. Please check your input and try again.

data.name: ConcurrencyConflict
data.value: The data was modified by another user. Please refresh and try again.

data.name: ServiceUnavailable
data.value: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
